sentences.en: A vertex with zero outdegree is called a sink.
sentences.cn: 出度为零的顶点称作收点.

sentences.en: Also, try to minimize changes of vertex or index buffer.
sentences.cn: 同样也要尽量减少顶点缓存或者索引缓存的切换.

sentences.en: An edge corresponds to a corridor and a vertex to the conjunction of several corridors.
sentences.cn: 边对应于走廓,而顶点对应于几条走廓的相交点.

sentences.en: Definition of a sphere a vertex is not allowed to enter. This allows collision against the animated cloth.
sentences.cn: 定义一个球体的一个顶点不允许进入。这允许反向碰撞动画布料。

sentences.en: Palm - hitting , the anterior fontanelle of the vertex and Baihui.
sentences.cn: 掌 击法 常用于头顶前囟与百会.

sentences.en: Per - vertex light is faster and more flexible but lacks resolution.
sentences.cn: 每顶点光照更快且其更加灵活,但是缺乏分辨率.

sentences.en: Select a vertex, point or other system as origin.
sentences.cn: 选择三个面,它们相交的点作为坐标点.

sentences.en: Set vertex streams and index buffer to the primitive.
sentences.cn: 集流顶点和索引缓冲区的原始.

sentences.en: So what are the capabilities and benefits of using Vertex Shaders?
sentences.cn: 那么,我们使用顶点着色的性能及利益在那里 呢 ?

sentences.en: The driver might allocate a larger buffer after this point, or you might need to reduce your vertex count.
sentences.cn: 在这点之后，驱动可能会分配一个更大的缓存，或者你可能需要降低你的顶点数量。

sentences.en: The vertex shader and pixel shader each have user - defined input and output.
sentences.cn: 顶点着色器和像素着色器都有用户定义的输入和输出.

sentences.en: Up to 128 instructions can be encoded in a single vertex shader.
sentences.cn: 指令的序列为128个操作长度.

sentences.en: Vertex a is the initial vertex and b is the terminal vertext.
sentences.cn: a顶点是始端顶点,而b是末端顶点.

sentences.en: Vertex coloring model and decomposing algorithm of gate assignment problem is offered.
sentences.cn: 给出了停机位分配问题顶点着色模型及其分解算法.

sentences.en: Vertex scan line number is the core concept of this algorithm.
sentences.cn: 顶点扫描线号是该算法中的核心概念.

sentences.en: We shall present some of the basic properties of the vertex and edge chromatic numbers.
sentences.cn: 我们将介绍顶点色数和边色数的一些基本性质.

sentences.en: You can create your vertex shader in two ways ( that I know ) .
sentences.cn: 创建 顶点着色 程序你可有两种方法.

words.tran_cn: 垂直的，直立的；[解剖] 头顶的，顶点的

trans.tran_cn: 最高点，顶点，<数>（三角形、圆锥体等与底相对的）顶，（三角形、多边形等的）角的顶点
trans.tran_en: the point where two lines meet to form an angle, especially the point of a triangle
